OptionPackage.DisplayName: SINAMICS Startdrive G110M, G120, G120C, G120D, G120P, G115D
SINAMICS Startdrive G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210

Comment.MultiLanguageText: Follow the example ST1, ST2, ST3, ST4...

LineComment.Text: Local part management - variable can be either wstring OR array of char
If array of char, the array pass through a filter to delete empty positions
Copy all positions of char array
Find the last valid char
Set the index of last valid char
Convert the array of char in string
Copy only the right amount of data
"MII_Parameters".M000_Status.error := TRUE;
Normal mode
Start attempts counter
Set argument parameters
When there are more than one station at the machine, the _STn is concatenated to the PLC_ID
Set PLC_ID correctly accordingly to application
Set index to Production Declaration
Downgraded mode
Set argument parameters
HMI MUST RESET THE VARIABLE AFTER STORING THE VALUES
Send pre defined data to DMC to test the communication and declaration
Start attempts counter
Set standard test arguments
